content: pattern includes instructions for both with/without ear holes level beginner ****important for your pet s safety please only use under supervision **** finished size hat is pliable- you can stretch or squash the base to better fit your sweet fluff s noggin height 2 ¼ width brim is 4 ½ or 3 at base or between ear holes not stretched or squashed this pattern may not be resold you may not resell sell or redistribute this pattern in part or in whole you may sell your creations from this pattern online in person and on a commission basis please credit cutecreepycrochet for the pattern and please feel free to share your creations on social media- if you wish to tag please use cutecreepycrochet on ig ravely and facebook i d love to see what you ve come up with and your cat photos supplies size 3 5mm us e-4 hook used throughout stitch markers or similar pattern is worked in the round- markers are for end of row yarn needle worsted weight yarn weight medium/4 stitches/abbreviations used- **us terminology st stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch increase regular increase two crochet stitches in one stitch decrease decrease crochet two stitches together f/o finish or fasten_off blo back loop only flo front loop only ****important for your pet s safety please only use under supervision ****
